- Title: Mama (2013) | Plot: Ever since surviving a domestic violence attack, Kim Addison has found the courage to take matters into her own hands. After learning MMA training in order to learn self- defense, Kim found the confidence to become a trainer herself. She has since set out to help others who have been victims of bullying and abuse just like her. Kim' personal mission is to empower, inspire and train women and children so they too can stand up for themselves against bullying. Among her students is 13- year- old Logan Chauvin. Logan was terrorized daily in school by callous bullies. He has been training vigorously with Kim to overcome his experience and is now getting ready for his first real MMA fight. Although Kim has done everything in her power to train Logan to stand up to bullies at school, there is very little she can do to protect him from his first real MMA opponent.

"The Dirty Dozen" is a classic American crime film released in 1945. Directed by John Ford, the movie stars Marlon Brando, Jack LeCompte, Lee Marvin, and Charles Bronson. 

The movie follows a group of professional criminals who are sent to prison for their previous crimes. While in prison, the men escape from prison and go on a killing spree to eliminate anyone who may have witnessed their escape or has been involved in any way with their escape.
